snippet: The company’s speciality is designing meetings — never an easy task, but even more difficult when participants are torn apart because of opposing religious, cultural or political views.
abstract: The company’s speciality is designing meetings — never an easy task, but even more difficult when participants are torn apart because of opposing religious, cultural or political views.

headline.main: For Entrepreneur in Conflict Resolution, Business Is Good
